definition: to wander (typically of an errant priest)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The cloud, floating around, like an old man wander the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 云，飘来飘去，就像一位老人云游四海。

sentences.english: Ban Sa wanders the four directions, noisily left the innumerable jokes story.
sentences.chinese: 班萨云游四方，闹出了无数笑话的故事。

sentences.english: You made my childhood happy, But still I longed to roam.
sentences.chinese: 你给了我快乐童年，可我还是去云游四方。

sentences.english: He traveled the land  in search of worthy foes.
sentences.chinese: 他云游四方寻找实力相当的对手。

sentences.english: Youth hostels all over the world provide cheap accommodations for travelling youths .
sentences.chinese: 提供四处云游的国际青年便宜的住处。

sentences.english: Bush was originally 10 side here is the local skies Taoist deity.
sentences.chinese: 这里原是十方丛林，是云游道士挂单的地方。

definition: to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
Zhongnan Mountains, near Xi'an/also known as the Taiyi Mountains
to die in a seated posture (Buddhism)
to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
one of three fabled islands in Eastern sea, abode of immortals
square zhang (i.e. unit of area 10 feet square)/monastic room 10 feet square/Buddhist or Daoist abbot/abbot's chamber
